targets.query:
SELECT 
last("load1") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_1",
last("load5") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_5",
last("load15") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_15"
FROM "system" 
WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)

SELECT last("health_status") AS "health_status"
FROM "docker_container_health"
WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "container_name"::tag
targets.rawSql:
SELECT last("health_status") AS "health_status"
FROM "docker_container_health"
WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY "container_name"::tag

targets.query:
SELECT 
last("usage_percent") AS usage, 
"container_name"
FROM "docker_container_mem" 
WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" = '${hostname}'
GROUP BY "container_name"
targets.rawSql: SELECT "host", MAX("time"), AVG("usage_percent") AS usage, "container_name" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = '${hostname}' GROUP BY "container_name", "host" HAVING usage > 0

targets.query:
SELECT 
last("usage_percent") AS usage, 
"container_name"
FROM "docker_container_cpu" 
WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" = '${hostname}'
GROUP BY "container_name"
targets.rawSql: SELECT "host", MAX("time"), AVG("usage_percent") AS usage, "container_name" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = '${hostname}' GROUP BY "container_name", "host" HAVING usage > 0

targets.query: SELECT last("n_containers_running") AS running,  last("n_containers_paused") AS paused, last("n_containers_stopped") AS stopped FROM "docker" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
targets.rawSql: SELECT "n_containers_running", "n_containers_stopped", "n_containers_paused", "host" FROM "docker" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = '${hostname:singlequotes}' ORDER BY "time"

targets.query: SELECT last("used_percent") AS memory FROM "mem" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", "used_percent" AS "RAM", "host" FROM "mem" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} ORDER BY "time" DESC

targets.query: SELECT last("used_percent") AS disk FROM "disk" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", "used_percent" AS "DISK" FROM "disk" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1

targets.query: SELECT last("used_percent") AS memory_used FROM "mem" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", "used_percent" AS "RAM", "host" FROM "mem" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT "time", "used_percent" AS "DISK" FROM "disk" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1

targets.query: SELECT "uptime_format" FROM "system" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "usage_system" FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    DATE_BIN($__interval, "time") AS time,
    MAX("usage_user") AS usage_user,
    "host",
    "cpu"
FROM "cpu"
WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = ${hostname:singlequote} AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total'
GROUP BY DATE_BIN($__interval, "time"), "cpu", "host"
ORDER BY time

targets.query:
SELECT 
max("load1") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_1",
max("load5") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_5",
max("load15") / max("n_cpus") AS "load_15"
FROM "system" 
WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) 
ORDER BY time DESC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    DATE_BIN(INTERVAL '1 minute', time) AS _time,
    AVG(usage_user) AS load_1,
    host,
    cpu
FROM cpu
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom AND time <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} AND cpu = 'cpu-total'
GROUP BY _time, host, cpu
ORDER BY _time

targets.query:
SELECT 
mean("usage_percent")
FROM "docker_container_cpu"
WHERE $timeFilter AND "usage_percent" > 0 AND ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)
GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name"
targets.rawSql: SELECT "host", MAX("time"), AVG("usage_percent") AS usage, "container_name" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = '${hostname}' GROUP BY "container_name", "host" HAVING usage > 0

targets.query:
SELECT 
mean("usage_percent")
FROM "docker_container_mem"
WHERE $timeFilter AND "usage_percent" > 0 AND ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)
GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name"
targets.rawSql: SELECT "host", MAX("time"), AVG("usage_percent") AS usage, "container_name" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "host" = '${hostname}' GROUP BY "container_name", "host" HAVING usage > 0

SELECT 
  DATE_BIN($__interval, "time") as _time, 
  "used_percent" AS "memory", 
  "host" 
FROM "mem" 
WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} 
ORDER BY _time DESC

SELECT 
  DATE_BIN($__interval, "time") as _time, 
  "used_percent" AS "disk", 
  "host" 
FROM "disk" 
WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND host = ${hostname:singlequote} 
ORDER BY _time DESC

targets.query:
SELECT
  DIFFERENCE("read_bytes") AS "read_bytes"
FROM (
  SELECT
    MAX("io_service_bytes_recursive_read") AS "read_bytes"
  FROM "docker_container_blkio"
  WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)
  GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" 
)
WHERE "read_bytes" > 0
GROUP BY "container_name" FILL(0)

SELECT
  DIFFERENCE("write_bytes") AS "write_bytes"
FROM (
  SELECT
    MAX("io_service_bytes_recursive_write") AS "write_bytes"
  FROM "docker_container_blkio"
  WHERE $timeFilter AND ("host"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)
  GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name"
)
WHERE "write_bytes" > 0
GROUP BY "container_name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: hostname

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY = "host"
